item.title: Bowen: Denying food to Gaza is 'weapon of war', says UN refugee agency head
item.description: The BBC's international editor Jeremy Bowen speaks to the head of the UN agency that supports Palestinian refugees.

item.title: Marcos' hold on senate grows shaky while Duterte wins mayor race from jail
item.description: The Philippines' mid-term elections saw fewer than expected senators elected from President Marcos' camp.

item.title: Trump's mediation offer on Kashmir puts India in a tight spot
item.description: For decades, third-party mediation on Kashmir has been taboo in the Indian foreign ministry.

item.title: Russia responsible for downing of MH17, UN body rules
item.description: All 298 people on board the Malaysia Airlines flight died after it was shot down by a Russian-made missile.

item.title: Trump defends plan to use Qatari luxury jet for Air Force One
item.description: Trump says he'd be "stupid" to not accept the aircraft "free of charge", after Qatar denied it amounted to a gift.
